message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm a bit flexible, but I don't think it's worth more than that.

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $15,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
